EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-02-07 O'Reilly Dual eBook eBlast - US and EMEA Non-MQLs.ES-2019-02-07 O'
EmailTemplate.subject: =?UTF-8?Q?=F0=9F=86=93=F0=9F=93=96?= - Intro to IaaS Solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/whitepapers?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRRYAA2]]> Are you trying to build a working IaaS solution in either AWS or Azure? Don't tackle that project alone. Turbonomic can help.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/aws-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRROAA2]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRRTAA2]]>
Intro to AWS Iaas Solutions Master AWS core components and how to design for resiliency. Learn how to launch and manage your cloud solution using either the AWS command-line interface or the AWS web console.
Intro to Microsoft Azure IaaS Learn how to manage your Azure IaaS solution, including virtual machines and storage, using both the Azure CLI and the Azure Portal interface.
Wherever you are in your cloud journey, Turbonomic can help!
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/whitepapers?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRRYAA2]]>
